traits.name: Disassemble
entries: If the juggernaut is reduced to 0 hit points, twelve skeletons rise from its remains.

traits.name: Falling Apart
entries: If the juggernaut does not have all of its hit points at the start of its turn, it loses 10 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The juggernaut makes two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Avalanche of Bones {@recharge 5}
entries: The juggernaut collapses into a large heap before quickly reforming. Each creature within 10 feet of the juggernaut must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8 damage) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is also knocked {@condition prone}.
